author: Jeffery Martin
title: 32 Economists From Both Major Parties Sign Letter Urging U.S. Not to Open Country Prematurely
description: "Saving lives and saving the economy are not in conflict right now; we will hasten the return to robust economic activity by taking steps to stem the spread of the virus and save lives," the letter read.
content:
Members of the bipartisan Economic Strategy Group signed a Wednesday letter which said the U.S. must pull together to combat the coronavirus before opening businesses and attempting to restart the economy.
